name: MMA Brand Services Pte. Ltd.
description: Provider of strategic branding services intended to accelerate e-commerce growth. The company uses significant growth capital to transform e-commerce brands by buying category-winning brands with a strong track record, high product quality, and great customer reviews, enabling businesses to grow into global, well-loved, and enduring household names.
